Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Massive picture windows to the south and the east fill the room with light from the outside by day with massive chandeliers and ornate wall sconces illuminating the space after sunset. The turquoise walls feature jade plaster relief panels, the rich jewel tones complemented by a jade green carpet with ruby red accents underfoot. Overhead, silver-accented cantilever ceiling panels in emerald plaster reflect the light, the silver carried through in the minute foliate embroidery on the turquoise blue chaise lounges and couches that line the walls. The windows are free from drapery, allowing unfettered views of the road and canal through the dozens of multicolored crystals that hang from the top of the window casements at varying heights in a glittering array.

The turquoise walls feature jade plaster relief panels, the rich jewel tones complemented by a jade green carpet with ruby red accents underfoot. The windows are free from drapery, allowing unfettered views of the road and canal through the dozens of multicolored crystals that hang from the top of the window casements at varying heights in a glittering array.

Massive picture windows to the south and the east fill the room with light from the outside by day with massive chandeliers and ornate wall sconces illuminating the space after sunset. The turquoise walls feature jade plaster relief panels, the rich jewel tones complemented by a jade green carpet with ruby red accents underfoot. Overhead, silver-accented cantilever ceiling panels in emerald plaster reflect the light, the silver carried through in the minute foliate embroidery on the turquoise blue chaise lounges and couches that line the walls. The windows are free from drapery, allowing unfettered views of the road and canal through the dozens of multicolored crystals that hang from the top of the window casements at varying heights in a glittering array.
an arched double door leading north

Each side of the arched double door leading to the north is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
an arched double door leading west

Each side of the arched double door leading to the west is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
